# Chamber of Safety (WondArch)
## Overview
**Chamber of Safety:** This extra provides anything in this stronghold space damage reduction against ranged weapons, akin to that of a *[[Protection from Arrows (Spell)|protection from arrows]]* spell. Anything in the area of effect, including the stronghold space itself, gains DR 10/+1 against ranged weapons.

*Caster Level:* 3rd; Prerequisites: [[Craft Wondrous Item (Feat)|Craft Wondrous Item]], *[[Protection from Arrows (Spell)|protection from arrows]]**; Market Price:* 9,000 gp.

**Source:** Stronghold Builders Guidebook (WotC), pg. 74
